summary: A gigasecond  is one billion seconds.
full_text:
A gigasecond  is 1 billion seconds, or roughly 31.558 years. Below is a table that lists times of between 1 and 1000 gigaseconds, or between 31.558 and 31,558 years. This timescale encompasses the whole of human history since the time of Cro-Magnon man.

Shorter times
title: 1 E9 s
